options.systemMessage:
=#Overview
You are a proffesional front desk agent that checks for availability of a place.


##Tools
-getManyEvents ‚Äì Use this tool when you need to retrieve multiple events from a calendar in order to see when the place or user is busy or free.

-getAvailability ‚Äì Use this tool when the user asks about specific time slots and you need to confirm whether those slots are available or not.


##Rules
If the user sends only a date ‚Üí use getManyEvents.

If the user sends a date and a time ‚Üí use getAvailability.

Present results in a clear and user-friendly way (e.g., list free/busy times or confirm availability).

If the tools return raw data, interpret it into natural language for the user.

nodes.name: Get many events in Google Calendar
Get availability in a calendar in Google Calendar

data.name: Make every product photo look like a luxury ad fully automated AI + google drive

parameters.text: Analyze this product image and create a professional background prompt for commercial photography. Focus on style, lighting, and environment that would complement this product.

parameters.content:
## ü§ñ AI Agent Notes (Optional)

**Purpose**: Generates background prompts automatically

**How to Use**:
1. This node is OPTIONAL - you can skip it entirely
2. If using, connect a vision-capable AI model
3. Alternative: Write your own prompt directly in the Pixelcut node

**‚ö†Ô∏è Important Limitations**:
- Use OpenAI GPT-4 Vision or Claude Vision instead
- Or simply disable this node and use manual prompts

**Better Options**:
- OpenAI GPT-4 Vision Preview
- Anthropic Claude Vision
- Google Gemini Vision
- Manual prompt creation

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value: Professional studio background with soft lighting, clean surfaces, and elegant atmosphere

parameters.content:
## üé® Pixelcut.ai Configuration

**Required Setup**:
1. Get API key from pixelcut.ai
2. Replace YOUR_PIXELCUT_API_KEY with your actual key
3. Customize the prompt field for your desired background

**Supported Formats**:
- PNG (recommended for products)
- JPG (smaller file size)
- WEBP (modern format)

## ‚ö†Ô∏è File Format Warning

**Current Limitation**: 
This workflow only processes PNG files

**To Support Other Formats**:
1. Go to "Get Images from Google Drive" node
2. Change queryString from :
   - ".jpg" for JPEG files
   - ".webp" for WebP files
 ‚û°Ô∏è to : ".png" 

**Output Format**:
Change the "format" parameter in Pixelcut node:
- "png" - Best quality, transparency support
- "jpg" - Smaller file size
- "webp" - Modern format, good compression

**Multiple Formats**: Use OR operator:
"mimeType='image/png' or mimeType='image/jpeg'"

## üö® Background Removal Warning

**Important**: This workflow expects products WITHOUT backgrounds

**If Your Images Have Backgrounds**:
1. Add a background removal step BEFORE this workflow
2. Use Pixelcut's remove-background endpoint:
   - URL: https://api.developer.pixelcut.ai/v1/remove-background
   - Same API key and setup

**Background Removal Options**:
- Pixelcut.ai remove-background API
- Remove.bg API
- Deep-Image.ai background removal
- Adobe Creative SDK

## üìã Setup Checklist

**Required Credentials**:
‚ñ° Google Drive OAuth2 API
‚ñ° Pixelcut.ai API Key
‚ñ° Vision AI API (if using AI prompts) any AI Accepts images

**Folder Configuration**:
‚ñ° Replace YOUR_GOOGLE_DRIVE_FOLDER_ID
‚ñ° Replace YOUR_OUTPUT_FOLDER_ID
‚ñ° Ensure proper folder permissions

**Security Notes**:
‚ñ° Never share API keys publicly
‚ñ° Use environment variables for sensitive data
‚ñ° Regularly rotate API keys
‚ñ° Monitor API usage and costs

**Testing Steps**:
1. Test with single image first
2. Verify output quality
3. Check file naming convention
4. Confirm folder permissions
5. Monitor API rate limits

options.systemMessage:
=# System Prompt

## Overview
You are an expert receptionist responsible for booking a venue for parties.  
Your main task is to **create events in Google Calendar** on behalf of users, ensuring all necessary details are captured accurately and clearly.  

## Tools
- **createEvent** ‚Üí Use this tool to schedule a new event in the calendar with the provided information (e.g., date, time, duration, title, description, and guests if available).  

## Behavior Rules
- After creating an event, summarize the booking details in natural language.
- Don't ask for additional informations ot any other confirmations

###Others

parameters.subject: üöÄ Balul Bobocilor 2025 ‚Äì acesta e codul tƒÉu de recomandare!
parameters.message:
=üëã Salut,{{ $json.Prenume }}

√é»õi mul»õumim cƒÉ te-ai √Ænscris √Æn concursul Balului Bobocilor ‚Äì Colegiul Economic F.S. Nitti 2025! üéâ

Aici este codul tƒÉu unic de recomandare:

üëâ {{ $json.Code }}

Cum func»õioneazƒÉ?

1.DƒÉ codul prietenilor tƒÉi c√¢nd √Æ»ôi cumpƒÉrƒÉ bilet.

2.Fiecare bilet cumpƒÉrat cu codul tƒÉu se contorizeazƒÉ automat.

3.La final, persoanele cu cele mai multe recomandƒÉri vor c√¢»ôtiga premii. üèÜ

üìÖ √énscrierile √Æn concurs sunt deschise p√¢nƒÉ la 7 octombrie 2025.

‚ö†Ô∏è Nu uita: fiecare prieten convins √ÆnseamnƒÉ un pas mai aproape de podium.

üì≤ √én plus, fƒÉ un story pe Instagram cu noi »ôi dƒÉ-ne tag la @balul.bobocilor_eco2025 ca sƒÉ vadƒÉ toatƒÉ lumea cƒÉ faci parte din concurs! üí´

Ne vedem pe 17 octombrie, ora 18:00, la Club Heaven, Timi»ôoara pentru cea mai tare petrecere a anului! üî•

‚Äî
Echipa Balul Bobocilor 2025
